resources.string: A Quiz of Ice and Fire!
This quiz will test your knowledge of the mottos for each of the nine great houses of Westeros

Question 1: House Stark

House Stark is located in the Icey North and there motto reflects there anticipation of hard times.(It is also a popular meme) Can you complete the below Motto?

 	 ________ is coming

Question 2: House Arryn

House Arryn is located in the Mountain regions in the East and hold Honor above all

 Can you guess which of the below are the words for House Arryn:
A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush

Question 3: House Greyjoy

House Greyjoy is based in the Iron Islands of the western coast of Westeros. And because natural resources are scarce they take to pirating and pillaging.

Which of the following statements below are the words of House Greyjoy
The Tides of Change are Upon Thee

Question 4: House Martell

House Martell is located in the desert region in the south of westeros. being in a remote region has shielded them from being conquered by any of the other houses.

Which of the following statements below are the words of House Martell
Rather die on my feet than live on my knees

Question 5: House Targaryan

 House Targaryan has a history steeped in conquest and brutal Tyranny and their house sigil is a dragon.

 Guess which two thematic elements complete the house motto of House Targaryan below:

_________ and ______

Question 6: House Tully

 House Tully rules in the Riverlands and hold strong core values. 

Guess which of the below are the words of house Tully:

Question 7: House Tyrell

 House Tyrell is a young and important house as they control much of the fertile cropland.

 Can you guess which of the following statements below are the words of House Tyrell:

Question 8: House Baratheon

 House Baratheon rules the Storm Lands in the East, a region whose people are hardened by dangerous storms and brutal conflict.

 Can you guess which of the following statements below are the words of House Baratheon?
Doe is for deer a female deer
Mess with the Stag and you get the Antlers

Question 9: House Lannister

 House Lannister has a golden lion for a sigil and rules in the West. Where they control various gold mines making them the richest of all the great houses. They have an official and an unoffcial motto, which all westerosi seem to mix up.

 Can you pick out the two mottos attributed to this house:
A Lannister always pays his debts
Tis better to be a Lion for a day than a sheep your whole life
